TextView.android:text: 1. Prerequisite: All students entering into Math 1201 must have met one of the following conditions: Earned a grade of C or higher in Math 1011 or Math 1026 ; achieved scores on the COMPASS test of s_1 = 70, s_2 = 70, s_3 =70, and s_5 =70
2. It is recommended that students in this program fulfill their writing-intensivecourse requirement with CISC 2820W or Philosophy (PHIL) 3318W.
